creditline: Gift of Susan and David Plimpton in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: nude little smiling boy with two dimples and short curly hair, riding on a seahorse; lily pads and scallops on base; octagonal bottom has alternating seahorses and fluted designs; greenish patina

signed: on lily pads on base, incised: [EVELYN B. LONGMAN / FECIT - 1935]
title: Putto on Seahorse
